title: Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists thetables and columns in your data source.
OB: On the iSeries platform using the JTOpenJDBC drivers, this tree control shows every schema (aka catalog) on the system.This is easly several hundred tables. Using the code in CVS from6/30/05, I see the schema filter, however I still have the warning message onload since the tree is being populated on load.
EB: Could the load of the tree bedeferred until the user expands the tree or applys a filter?
SR: When the data set editor is opened youhave to wait while the entire schema is queried and eventually get the "Only 500items can be viewed in the available list...".Bug <a href="https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/showbug.cgi?id=101372"101372</aasks for the ability to filter based on schema.
